abstract: Traders probably do not expect anything as seductive as a promise to cut interest rates in Ben S. Bernanke’s update to Congress on the economy and Federal Reserve policy.
snippet: Traders probably do not expect anything as seductive as a promise to cut interest rates in Ben S. Bernanke’s update to Congress on the economy and Federal Reserve policy.
lead_paragraph: TRADERS probably do not expect anything as seductive as a promise to cut interest rates in Ben S. Bernanke’s update to Congress on the economy and Federal Reserve policy. But after months of talk about the perils of inflation, any hint of moderation on Wednesday is likely to be received with some affection.

headline.main: An Eye on Inflation as Growth Picks Up
headline.print_headline: An Eye On Inflation As Growth Picks Up
